name: Stronger Together (LucidDH)
description:
You've been captured by aliens and they took the energy from your sword and contained them in batteries. They just threw  you in the middle of their ship, thinking you were dead. Now you need to take back the power of your sword and find your way to an escape pod.

Collect batteries to power up your sword, its power will increase as more battery energy is combined together. 

Submission for the Brackeys 2021.1 jam.

Music from Christopher Larkin

CONTROLS:

A, D - Left and right

-W or SPACE - Jump

-LEFT CLICK or LEFT ARROW - Attack/slash
